item.description:
If anyone has an item they'd like to try out in the light tents on Sunday, please feel free to bring it with you. We'll do our best to accommodate everyone.

Join the CAPE Group on Sunday, December 13 at 1p.m. as we shoot using light tents. We'll have a variety of items available to shoot such as flowers, products, and jewelry. This event will be held in a "round robin" type format to ensure we all get equal shooting time at each light tent station. We're also going to hold a demonstration on how to make your own light tent, on the cheap! Come early (12:30'ish) as we'll have pizza, coffee, and soft drinks available!

We are in need of 3 more light tent/light setups. If you have one that can be used for the day please let me know. If all else fails we'll get creative. (Making a Light Tent) Thanks in advance!

Here are a couple of links to get you started:

Step by Step Instruction

DIY Light Tent

Another DIY Light Tent
item.name: Light Tent Play & Demonstration
